title: Bursachiri Waterfall
about: The Bursachiri waterfall is located in the Mtskheta-Mtianeti region, in the Dusheti Municipality, east of the abandoned village of the Gudamakari community, Salagobo, in the middle of the Bursachiri river, at 2,170 meters above sea level. The total height of the waterfall is about 20 meters. It falls in two steps, the upper step is 3-4 meters high, and the lower step is 16-17 meters. The waterfall flowing among the huge rocks creates a delightful sight. Bursachiri Fall is a very impressive place and is perfect for a short trip. Alpine meadows, mountains, cliffs and a stunning waterfall attract many lovers of nature and wandering. The walking distance is only 2-2.5 km, so pretty easily you can make an unforgettable adventure and unwind with friends or family.
